name: Alto Tech Co., Ltd.
description: Operator of an energy management platform intended to help hotel and building owners to manage their energy consumption. The company's platform helps to reduce the use of energy by automatically adjusting the temperature, mode, and operation of the air conditioning system and also helps in collecting electricity usage data for analysis and processing, enabling hotels to save money on their electricity bills, be more energy efficient, and at the end disrupt the hospitality and energy sectors with artificial intelligence.
one_liner: Operator of an energy management platform intended to help hotel and building owners to manage their energy consumption. The company's platform helps to reduce the use of energy by automatically adjusting the temperature, mode, and operation of the air conditioning system and also helps in collecting electricity usage data for analysis and processing, enabling hotels to save money on their electricity bills, be more energy efficient, and at the end disrupt the hospitality and energy sectors with artificial intelligence.

name: Hakuna Services, Inc
description: Developer of an on-demand waste management platform designed to make public spaces clean and tidy and make waste disposal accessible. The company's platform offers customizable junk removal, dumpster rentals, recycling and hazardous waste disposal, enabling customers to declutter with peace of mind and contribute to a greener environment.
one_liner: Developer of an on-demand waste management platform designed to make public spaces clean and tidy and make waste disposal accessible. The company's platform offers customizable junk removal, dumpster rentals, recycling and hazardous waste disposal, enabling customers to declutter with peace of mind and contribute to a greener environment.

name: EcoCart Sciences Inc.
description: Developer of sustainable shopping applications designed to make fighting climate change simple, cost-effective and accessible. The company's application calculates and eliminates the carbon footprint of online orders, pops a notification about participating stores and provides points that can be redeemed for gift cards or to make an important impact on the planet, enabling e-commerce brands and consumers to offset the environmental repercussions of their orders while shopping at their favorite stores.
one_liner: Developer of sustainable shopping applications designed to make fighting climate change simple, cost-effective and accessible. The company's application calculates and eliminates the carbon footprint of online orders, pops a notification about participating stores and provides points that can be redeemed for gift cards or to make an important impact on the planet, enabling e-commerce brands and consumers to offset the environmental repercussions of their orders while shopping at their favorite stores.

name: Evreka Yazılım Donanım Danışmanlık Eğitim San. Tic. A.Ş.
description: Developer of a software-based smart waste collection system designed to make the environment clean. The company's system collects waste through wireless sensors, which can measure how full a garbage bin is and instantaneously send the information to the cloud using M2M technology, enabling clients to reduce garbage collection costs.
one_liner: Developer of a software-based smart waste collection system designed to make the environment clean. The company's system collects waste through wireless sensors, which can measure how full a garbage bin is and instantaneously send the information to the cloud using M2M technology, enabling clients to reduce garbage collection costs.

name: GreenQ Ltd
description: Developer of a waste management technology designed to offer connected garbage collection for municipalities. The company's technology uses a hardware-enabled garbage waste tracking device that is installed on all garbage trucks which collects real-time data on the waste pickup process, without any need for manual activation, enabling garbage collection vendors, system integrators, and municipalities to weigh incoming waste and predict the garbage production rate as well as reduce expenses and emissions while also providing improved services to their citizens.
one_liner: Developer of a waste management technology designed to offer connected garbage collection for municipalities. The company's technology uses a hardware-enabled garbage waste tracking device that is installed on all garbage trucks which collects real-time data on the waste pickup process, without any need for manual activation, enabling garbage collection vendors, system integrators, and municipalities to weigh incoming waste and predict the garbage production rate as well as reduce expenses and emissions while also providing improved services to their citizens.

name: Hydroleap Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of wastewater treatment technology designed to replace expensive chemical treatments with a smart electrical treatment for wastewater. The company's technology focuses on the treatment of high-suspended solid, high oil, and heavy metal-contaminated wastewater, enabling clients to receive water recycling services using electrical and membrane treatment systems.
one_liner: Developer of wastewater treatment technology designed to replace expensive chemical treatments with a smart electrical treatment for wastewater. The company's technology focuses on the treatment of high-suspended solid, high oil, and heavy metal-contaminated wastewater, enabling clients to receive water recycling services using electrical and membrane treatment systems.

name: Pluto AI, Inc.
description: Developer of an operational data platform designed to empower operators to automate performance monitoring for any industrial workflow. The company's platform makes businesses drive return on investment by reducing resource consumption and operating costs and also provides data-driven operations by moving insights and AI from the back office to front-line operators, managers, and executives, enabling operators to automatically monitor the performance of critical processes and have access to actionable information.
one_liner: Developer of an operational data platform designed to empower operators to automate performance monitoring for any industrial workflow. The company's platform makes businesses drive return on investment by reducing resource consumption and operating costs and also provides data-driven operations by moving insights and AI from the back office to front-line operators, managers, and executives, enabling operators to automatically monitor the performance of critical processes and have access to actionable information.

name: Rachio, Inc.
description: Developer of a sprinkler control system designed to adjust watering amounts. The company's technology saves watering bills using a laptop or smartphone to schedule watering times, forecasts soil and plant type, and sun exposure, and customizes the watering schedule, enabling users to save water and money.
one_liner: Developer of a sprinkler control system designed to adjust watering amounts. The company's technology saves watering bills using a laptop or smartphone to schedule watering times, forecasts soil and plant type, and sun exposure, and customizes the watering schedule, enabling users to save water and money.

name: Remoov, Inc.
description: Provider of decluttering services intended to reduce waste by increasing recycling and reuse of products. The company services collect all the items the client wants to sell, donate, or discard with one pickup, and the collected items are then handled through consignment sales, donations, or recycling, enabling users to declutter their homes.
one_liner: Provider of decluttering services intended to reduce waste by increasing recycling and reuse of products. The company services collect all the items the client wants to sell, donate, or discard with one pickup, and the collected items are then handled through consignment sales, donations, or recycling, enabling users to declutter their homes.

name: Seppure Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of a nano-filtration technology designed to revolutionize chemical separation and purification in multiple industries. The company's technology provides a sustainable package for industrial chemical separations by replacing the current distillation process with chemical-resistant nano-filtration membranes, enabling clients to lower global energy use, emissions, and pollution substantially.
one_liner: Developer of a nano-filtration technology designed to revolutionize chemical separation and purification in multiple industries. The company's technology provides a sustainable package for industrial chemical separations by replacing the current distillation process with chemical-resistant nano-filtration membranes, enabling clients to lower global energy use, emissions, and pollution substantially.

name: Solarstic
description: Developer of ultra-lightweight, design-flexible solar modules for vehicles and industrial rooftops, spun out from Hyundai Motor's internal solar system team. The company operates a proprietary plastic encapsulation and injection molding process that replaces conventional glass solar panels, enabling scalability and carbon-credit alignment across mobility and RE100 manufacturing use cases.
one_liner: Developer of ultra-lightweight, design-flexible solar modules for vehicles and industrial rooftops, spun out from Hyundai Motor's internal solar system team. The company operates a proprietary plastic encapsulation and injection molding process that replaces conventional glass solar panels, enabling scalability and carbon-credit alignment across mobility and RE100 manufacturing use cases.

name: SOLS Energy Sdn Bhd.
description: Provider of solar energy products and services intended to promote the use of green energy. The company offers grid-tied, off-grid, and hybrid solar thermal and water pump systems that facilitate reducing carbon dioxide emissions, enabling customers to get cost-effective access to clean energy.
one_liner: Provider of solar energy products and services intended to promote the use of green energy. The company offers grid-tied, off-grid, and hybrid solar thermal and water pump systems that facilitate reducing carbon dioxide emissions, enabling customers to get cost-effective access to clean energy.

name: SUSTAINFI INC.
description: Developer of carbon project finance platform designed to connect investors who want to invest sustainably with the products and services. The company's platform makes environmental, social, and governance (ESG) and sustainable investing simple to understand, enabling investors to find investments that will do well in the climate transition, and companies with strong environmental, social, or governance scores
one_liner: Developer of carbon project finance platform designed to connect investors who want to invest sustainably with the products and services. The company's platform makes environmental, social, and governance (ESG) and sustainable investing simple to understand, enabling investors to find investments that will do well in the climate transition, and companies with strong environmental, social, or governance scores

name: Upshift, Inc.
description: Fractional car subscription for people who don't need a car every day
one_liner: Fractional car subscription for people who don't need a car every day

name: WinCL, Inc.
description: Developer of climate action platform designed to offset carbon emissions. The company focuses on the environmental aspects of corporate operations, including ESG management and carbon credit purchase, marketplace, and carbon information provision, helping achieve true carbon-neutral win-win cooperation between developed and developing countries.
one_liner: Developer of climate action platform designed to offset carbon emissions. The company focuses on the environmental aspects of corporate operations, including ESG management and carbon credit purchase, marketplace, and carbon information provision, helping achieve true carbon-neutral win-win cooperation between developed and developing countries.

name: Valor Water Analytics, Inc.
description: Developer of interactive tools and dashboards designed to help utilities conserve water while increasing revenue and cost savings. The company's flagship product offers revenue loss detection by analyzing a utility's data to help identify eight apparent loss categories including meter accuracy and data errors.
one_liner: Developer of interactive tools and dashboards designed to help utilities conserve water while increasing revenue and cost savings. The company's flagship product offers revenue loss detection by analyzing a utility's data to help identify eight apparent loss categories including meter accuracy and data errors.

name: Stormpulse, Inc.
description: Developer of subscription-based software designed to synchronize commerce and climate. The company's subscription-based software provides sophisticated weather guidance in a one-stop shop that blends objective temperature output with numerical guidance for the full spectrum of temperature probabilities up to 40 days in advance, enabling energy producers, commodity investment firms, food shippers, auto manufacturers, and retailers to avail weather updates and facilitate more efficient transactions.
one_liner: Developer of subscription-based software designed to synchronize commerce and climate. The company's subscription-based software provides sophisticated weather guidance in a one-stop shop that blends objective temperature output with numerical guidance for the full spectrum of temperature probabilities up to 40 days in advance, enabling energy producers, commodity investment firms, food shippers, auto manufacturers, and retailers to avail weather updates and facilitate more efficient transactions.
